title: sj ligature
content:
Has anyone ever come across an ’sj’ ligature?

I’m trying to find one for inspiration, all suggestions welcome. My personal attempt is attached, hopefully!

Cheers

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080220064758im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sj-creative_4950.jpg)

 [‹ Wacom again](http://web.archive.org/web/20080220064758/http:/typophile.com/node/41922 "Go to previous forum topic") [Max Miedinger ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080220064758/http:/typophile.com/node/27380 "Go to next forum topic")
author: simonjudd

comments.content: Maybe [**Sj** oerd H. De Roos](http://web.archive.org/web/20080220064758/http:/www.myfonts.com/person/de-roos/sjoerd/hendrik/) has once done one? ;°)
Thin out that arc and it could work. Maybe.

Hi Eben,

I was thinking that as well, I’ve lowered it as well, think it works a bit better now.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080220064758im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sj_ligature_4360.jpg)
